meanings.sent1: I prefer hardcovers because they last longer than paperbacks.
meanings.sent2: The library had a section dedicated to hardcovers.
meanings.sent3: The hardcovers on the books were so tough, they could probably withstand a tornado!
meanings.sent4: Her love for hardcovers was like a shield against the wear and tear of time.
meanings.sent5: The sound of a hardcover closing is like a satisfying final note to a beautiful melody.

meanings.definition: The protective cover of a book.
meanings.sent1: She carefully removed the hardcovers to reveal the title of the book.
meanings.sent2: The hardcovers of the old books were worn and faded.
meanings.sent3: The hardcovers seemed to be whispering secrets to each other on the shelf.
meanings.sent4: His hardcovers were like armor protecting the precious pages inside.
meanings.sent5: The hardcovers gleamed under the soft light, inviting readers to explore the stories within.
